text: The Independent is a daily online newspaper in the United Kingdom, founded in 1986. Its sister paper, the Independent on Sunday is, as the name suggests, published on a Sunday. Originally a broadsheet newspaper, it became a tabloid in 2006. The paper stopped being printed in March 2016 and is now only available online. It tends to take a liberal and centre to centre-left political position. Category:1986 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:Newspapers published in the United Kingdom Category:Online newspapers
title: The Independent
